talk.author: did:plc:plike46pn6bnig6vfoo6tzzj
talk.utter: I'm already reaching my peak personal capacity for follows and am honestly not sure what I am going to do. I will never fault another person for not following me back - it's essential self care.

talk.author: did:plc:tm4y3c4dli6ycthrghbmzlgm
talk.utter: If you really want to do more, you could set people up as feeds that you subscribe to, then you can have multiple separate streams of people to read from.

talk.author: did:plc:plike46pn6bnig6vfoo6tzzj
talk.utter: That's a good idea. A lot of work. But, definitely worth considering.
